item.title: Female Short Form Video Creators For Ecommerce Brands/UGC - Upwork
item.description:
PROJECT REQUIREMENTS
-This product will only be sold through TikTok Shop
-You will need your own TikTok Shop account
-30 videos over approximately 30 days
-Non branded accounts

Bonus points if you are African American or Asain.

We are beginner-friendly but will adjust the rates.

Looking for skilled creators and beginner creators.

We offer commission and bonuses!


Posted On: June 30, 2024 21:04 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Management, Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Influencer Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Testimonial Video, English
Skills: Social Media Management, Social Media Account Setup, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Marketing Strategy, Influencer Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Testimonial Video, English
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
